author: treyzania
content: Probably also would be better to ask them directly

author: trent_vanepps
content:
we're trying to move away from this naming system because it can be confusing.

however, the features that people typically consider part of "ETH2" (sharding, Proof of Stake Beacon Chain) will still be developed, but under the general Ethereum umbrella.

eth1 = execution, e. layer, e. client
eth2 = consensus, c. layer, c. client

you'll hear these two terms together a lot!

author: hikariws
content: hmm I think that using eth1 and eth2 is very confusing... it's better to call execution and consensus
